Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.View.GUI

Class GUIControllerStatic

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.View.GUI.GUIControllerStatic
public class GUIControllerStatic extends Object
Class that is used to make the scene controllers have the reference to the GUIController, it is used to make so that they can send messages to the server and receive messages from the server.
